description: COCONUT/PROBIOTIC SPF 30 BRONZING SPRAY MINERAL SUNSCREENSun care + Skincare100% vegan and cruelty-freeWhat it is: Your BFF with SPF! A continuous SPF 30 BRONZING spray that utilizes all natural mineral sun protection, and is infused with caffeine for your beautiful body, and vegan probiotics to support skin health. Integrating skincare into sun care, this unique bronzing formula is designed to apply evenly, while delivering natural hydration from beneficial oils. Scented with natural coconut for a true beach vibe- no matter where your adventures may happen. Created by and for surfers (and all their friends who love to play and be in the sun and salt water). Get glowing beautiful bronze skin while being outdoors.What else you should know: Remember, your sunscreen only works if you use it correctly! Shake this can well as it contains suspended minerals that you need for best results. Apply liberally to all exposed skin and rub in with your hands for an even coverage. SPF numbers are determined in a lab. In the real world, no matter what the SPF, sunscreens start to lose effectiveness over time (2 hours max). So it's important to reapply every two hours or less and after swimming or heavy sweating. The most important factor is that you need to use enough sunscreen for adequate protection. An opaque bronze tint should be expected with this product for best results.What else you should know: Every true beauty knows it's what's on the inside that matters.Formulated without petroleum, parabens, silicones, retinyl palmitate, phthalates & chemical UV absorbers.Directions. Sun damage is serious and sunscreens are only effective if you use them properly!

Created by and for surfers (and all their friends who love to play and be in the sun and salt water).What else you should know: Remember, your sunscreen only works if you use it correctly! SPF numbers are determined in a lab. In the real world, no matter what the SPF, sunscreens start to lose effectiveness over time (2 hours max). So it's important to reapply every two hours or less and after swimming or heavy sweating. The most important factor is that you need to use enough sunscreen for adequate protection. And while our sunscreens apply evenly and can have a more translucent look, they work as a block and you need to cover your skin completely for effective results. description:
Sublime Bronze Self-Tanning Lotion in Medium Natural Tan moisturizes your skin while a perfect sunless tan develops. This lotion combines Vitamin E and gentle AHAs* to provide a beautiful, 100% natural-looking, streak-free tan. Use Sublime Bronze daily until you have reached your desired level of tan, and then apply 1-2 times per week. *With alpha hydroxyl acid (AHA) derivative.

Step 1: Cleanse and exfoliate skin. Step 2: Apply evenly all over body. Use sparingly around ankles, knees and elbows. Step 3: Wash hands thoroughly after use. Step 4: Let skin dry before putting on clothes. Step 5: Use daily until you have achieved the desired level of tan, and then apply 1-2 times a week. Best if used within 6 months of purchase.

Sunburn alert: this product does not contain a sunscreen and does not protect against sunburn. This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (aha) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Repeated exposure of unprotected skin while tanning may increase the risk of skin-aging skin cancer and other harmful effects to the skin even if you do not burn. Use sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.
